entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the one who has been down to see Aragog by night before. He is also the target of the thing's attack.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as expressing her concerns about leaving the castle at night and getting caught.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as agreeing with Hermione's concerns and stating that he would want to go even less if it were a question of saving Aragog.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is mentioned as expecting Harry and his friends to go down and cry over the thing's body.

entities.name: aragog
entities.description: Aragog is mentioned as being dead and the reason why Harry and his friends are hesitant to help Hagrid.

entities.name: thing
entities.description: The thing is mentioned as telling its mates to eat Harry and his friend, and expecting them to go down and cry over its body.

relationships.description: Hagrid expects Harry and his friends to go down and cry over the thing's body.
Hermione and Ron agree on their concerns about leaving the castle at night and getting caught.
